reviewText: I love George Beverly Shea and I love this dvd. It gives a good in sight to his faith and his mission for leading soul's to The Lord Jesus Christ through God's Word put to music and sung . George Beverly Shae finished well. He will be greatly missed.
I was thrilled to discover that these DVD'S were available.  Loved them both.  Thanks.
A marvelous overview of the live and ministry of Mr. Shea.
